text: Harshad Chopda (born 17 May 1983) is an Indian television actor known for his portrayal of Captain Aditya Hooda in Bepannaah and Dr. Abhimanyu Birla in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai. == Films == Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2015 Bondhu Amar Joy Bengali film 2017 2016 The End Rahul === Music videos === Year Title Singer(s) Notes 2020 Juda Kar Diya Stebin Ben 2021 Humsafar Suyyash Rai Musical series: Aakhiri Mulaqaat Pyaar Ke Saleeqe Lakshay Chaudhary, Aakanksha Sharma Ghalat Himani Kapoor Aakhiri Mulaqaat Suyyash Rai == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Indian television actors Category:1983 births Category:Living people
title: Harshad Chopda
